Sentencas: This paper presents a comparative exergy study of the performance of various gas turbine power generation plants and a high temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a combined fuel cell and Gas Turbine Power Plant with intercooling and reheating

Sentencas: The overall system is analysed and its exergy efficiency and exergy destruction are obtained, as well as individual models of each component.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a combined fuel cell and Gas Turbine Power Plant with intercooling and reheating

Sentencas: The results for selected operating conditions are compared against past literature data.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a combined fuel cell and Gas Turbine Power Plant with intercooling and reheating

Sentencas: Comparisons are presented in terms of thermal and exergy efficiencies, net power and exergy destruction rate, vs. the compression ratio and Turbine Inlet Temperature (TIT).
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a combined fuel cell and Gas Turbine Power Plant with intercooling and reheating

Sentencas: It is found that integrating a conventional GT plant with an SOFC can nearly double the efficiency of the cycle.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a combined fuel cell and Gas Turbine Power Plant with intercooling and reheating
